title: Group portrait of Vincennes and Orbin Street Block Club members, from left, seated: Marian Brooks and Esther Watkins; second row: Dorothy Harper, Annie Patterson, Elizabeth Reed, Robert A. Ruffin, guest of honor; Carrie Foster, Luella Bolyar, and Theodore Jones Sr.; standing: Isabelle Mitchell, Rubell Barnes, Bessie Ponder, Sarah Allen, Lillian Vaughn, Catherine Tabb, Howard C. McKinney, Yvonne Reed, Lorraine Jones, Maureen Reed, and Frances Noel, posed in home of Rubell Barnes, 2855 Orbin Street for buffet dinner party, another version
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
